price: Eat and graze your livestock. Indeed, there are signs in this for people of sound intellect.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱرۡعَوۡاْ أَنۡعَٰمَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
